snippet.title: EXODUS Gameplay Trailer: 'The Traveler's Creed'
snippet.description:
Check out the new EXODUS GAMEPLAY TRAILER, EXODUS: THE TRAVELER'S CREED. Join the Travelers, as they sacrifice their lives to travel through the Centauri Universe on a dangerous mission to save an isolated Awakened civilization from enslavement by Celestials. Our service – our sacrifice – discovers worlds, seeds hope, breaks empires. WE ARE THE TRAVELERS. 

Be the first to know about everything EXODUS — JOIN US AS A FOUNDER!
https://www.exodusgame.com/#founders-program

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ArchetypeEnt
X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/ArchetypeEnt
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/archetypeent
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@archetypeent
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@archetypeent
